hey folks and nerds! u should take a look at $POETF ur possibly be working with. 
A.B., cto optics division $AVGO, mentioned this highly undervalued stock, when asked about high performance computing. 
u could skip to the 30min mark but i recommend further watching and DD to realize how big this is. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RE15dwfRYos&t=2106s

@Florestan @chill_billy like suresh said and as i get it, "it s all about the waveguides". they are aligned and formed athermal and multiplexed by design, depending on customer needs. they re not only pretty small but also imo beautiful and stackable with unforseeable potential, thats why celestial AI was founded and D.L. left Poet 2 years ago, knowing exactly that this is going to be huge.  
($AVGO and $FB as potential and pushing customers isnt that bad in cutting edge tech) 
 
if we try to do the designs in optics like $ARMH does in electronics, i believe it is a great attempt to push many verticals out in a short as possible time, to deny a "unfriendly or cheap" buyout. management did great and i bought more today after the latest insider buy. 
 
everyone in here can be happy with poet, soon to be seen on nasdaq with tck symb $POET.
